decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed dwelling by virtue of its size, design and appearance would be out of keeping with other development in the street and would detract from the appearance of other dwellings in the street scene. The proposal would be contrary to policies ENV.1.1, H1.1, H.1.2 and H.3.3 of the Unitary Development Plan and Policies ENV-B.1.1, H.1.1, H.4.1 and H.6.3 of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.

Condition : 2 - The proposed dwelling would,  by reason of its size, location and design, be an overly-dominant feature that would cause loss of outlook and would dominate adjoining development at No. 12 and 14 Finch Drive. The proposed development is therefore considered to harm the amenities of those properties, and is contrary to policies ENV.1.1, H.1.2 and H.3.3 of the Unitary Development Plan and ENV-B.1.1, H.4.1 and H.6.3 of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.
description: Demolition of garages at 12-14 Finch Drive and the erection of a two storey 3 bedroomed house.
